import React from 'react' class Reg extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ username:"Samuel jazz john", password:"jazzy123", displayName:'samuel', alert:'', visible:false } } input=(e)=>{ this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } register=(e)=>{ e.preventdefault(); this.state.alert="You have registered successfully" this.setState({visible:!this.setState.visible}) } render(){ let visible=this.state.visible?'d-none':'d-block' return(
{this.state.alert}

REGISTRATION

  • {this.state.username}
  • {this.state.password}
  • {this.state.displayName}
) } } export default Reg;
